title: T206 Abbaticchio batting (Stripes) and Leifield batting.
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: T206 Abbaticchio batting (Stripes) and Leifield batting.
posts.post_content:
T206 Abbaticchio batting (Stripes on sleeves)-corner wear-$35.00 (Sold. Thank you, dougscats)

T206 Leifield batting.-is a little short to Abbaticchio and has a rising back top border from right to left which is not offset by left to right on the back bottom border. Afraid it may be trimmed. Also, the name, etc. is slightly cut off at the bottom of the front-$30.00

S/h outside of California, Oregon and the state of Washington is $5.00. In the aforementioned states the s/h is $5.50. These rates went up with the USPS' Christmas season rate adjustment. If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].

I’ll take Abbaticchio striped sleeves.

Email sent.
